20101229220642.000|20101229220644.000|TR0|located were just filled with snow, had 
20101229220644.000|20101229220647.000|TR0|not been shoveled.  Keep in mind that a

20101229220651.000|20101229220654.000|TR0|Brooklyn and Queens. So, that is a major 
20101229220654.000|20101229220656.000|TR0|problem.  In fact, Customs and Board of

20101229220659.000|20101229220701.000|TR0|their workers could not get to the airport.

20101229220718.000|20101229220720.000|TR0|still having that problem.  So, that is

20101229220725.000|20101229220728.000|TR0|owned, also confirmed to us that, indeed,

20101229220730.000|20101229220732.000|TR0|statement as a result of the shortages, 
20101229220732.000|20101229220735.000|TR0|they said, quote "Servicing of the 
20101229220735.000|20101229220737.000|TR0|departing aircraft was delayed as aircraft 
20101229220737.000|20101229220740.000|TR0|continued to arrive.  A shortage of 
20101229220740.000|20101229220742.000|TR0|aircraft parking positions resulted, 
20101229220742.000|20101229220744.000|TR0|causing delays to arriving aircraft."
20101229220744.000|20101229220747.000|TR0|

20101229220749.000|20101229220752.000|TR0|planes couldn't get out and the planes

20101229221940.000|20101229221943.000|TR0|

20101229223821.000|20101229223823.000|TR0|
20101229223823.000|20101229223826.000|TR0|PAULA HANCOCKS, CNN INTERNATIONAL 
20101229223826.000|20101229223828.000|TR0|CORRESPONDENT:  An open letter signed by 
20101229223828.000|20101229223830.000|TR0|around 30 wives of prominent rabbis has 
20101229223830.000|20101229223833.000|TR0|caused a bit of a stir here in Israel this 
20101229223833.000|20101229223835.000|TR0|Wednesday.  The letter says quite simply 
20101229223835.000|20101229223838.000|TR0|that Israeli girls should not date Arab 
20101229223838.000|20101229223840.000|TR0|men.  It says that Arab men will be polite 
20101229223840.000|20101229223843.000|TR0|at the beginning, but that behavior will 
20101229223843.000|20101229223845.000|TR0|only be temporary.
20101229223845.000|20101229223847.000|TR0|
20101229223847.000|20101229223850.000|TR0|Let me quote some of the letter itself.
20101229223850.000|20101229223852.000|TR0|
20101229223852.000|20101229223855.000|TR0|"As soon as you arrive at the village, 
20101229223855.000|20101229223857.000|TR0|your life will never be the same.  The 
20101229223857.000|20101229223859.000|TR0|attention will be replaced with curses, 
20101229223859.000|20101229223902.000|TR0|beatings, and humiliations."
20101229223902.000|20101229223904.000|TR0|
20101229223904.000|20101229223907.000|TR0|Now, this open letter was initiated by a 
20101229223907.000|20101229223909.000|TR0|group called Lehava, which is an extreme 
20101229223909.000|20101229223911.000|TR0|right-wing group that says its aim is to 
20101229223911.000|20101229223914.000|TR0|stop the "assimilation of the Jewish 
20101229223914.000|20101229223916.000|TR0|people."  There has been instant 
20101229223916.000|20101229223919.000|TR0|condemnation though from the reform 
20101229223919.000|20101229223921.000|TR0|movement.  More than 30 female rabbis have 
20101229223921.000|20101229223923.000|TR0|signed their own petition condemning this 
20101229223923.000|20101229223926.000|TR0|letter.
20101229223926.000|20101229223928.000|TR0|
20101229223928.000|20101229223931.000|TR0|Now, this comes just three weeks after a 
20101229223931.000|20101229223933.000|TR0|previous letter, an open letter, was 
20101229223933.000|20101229223936.000|TR0|signed by around 50 state-appointed 
20101229223936.000|20101229223938.000|TR0|rabbis.  This particular letter said that 
20101229223938.000|20101229223940.000|TR0|it was not allowed for Jews to rent or 
20101229223940.000|20101229223943.000|TR0|sell apartments to non-Jews.
20101229223943.000|20101229223945.000|TR0|
20101229223945.000|20101229223948.000|TR0|That, again, caused a lot of controversy 
20101229223948.000|20101229223950.000|TR0|and it was instantly condemned by 
20101229223950.000|20101229223952.000|TR0|politicians, by human rights groups.  And 
20101229223952.000|20101229223955.000|TR0|also, around 800 rabbis from across the

20101229224322.000|20101229224324.000|TR0|majority think that President Obama's 
20101229224324.000|20101229224327.000|TR0|policies will fail.  If you take a look at

20101229225506.000|20101229225508.000|TR0|
20101229225508.000|20101229225511.000|TR0|MALVEAUX:  There's a new call for dialogue 
20101229225511.000|20101229225513.000|TR0|in the midst of heightening tensions that 
20101229225513.000|20101229225515.000|TR0|could lead to all-out war on the Korean 
20101229225515.000|20101229225518.000|TR0|Peninsula.  South Korea's president is 
20101229225518.000|20101229225520.000|TR0|reportedly pushing for six-way 
20101229225520.000|20101229225523.000|TR0|international talks with the North as a 
20101229225523.000|20101229225525.000|TR0|means of diffusing the conflict.  Now, he 
20101229225525.000|20101229225527.000|TR0|says threatening military action against 
20101229225527.000|20101229225530.000|TR0|the North is not enough.  Four people were 
20101229225530.000|20101229225532.000|TR0|killed when North Korea struck a southern 
20101229225532.000|20101229225535.000|TR0|island in November.
20101229225535.000|20101229225537.000|TR0|
20101229225537.000|20101229225540.000|TR0|Now to a different kind of conflict on the 
20101229225540.000|20101229225542.000|TR0|Korean Peninsula. This one involving free 
20101229225542.000|20101229225544.000|TR0|speech on the Internet.
20101229225544.000|20101229225547.000|TR0|
20101229225547.000|20101229225549.000|TR0|Here is CNN's Kyung Lah.
20101229225549.000|20101229225552.000|TR0|
20101229225552.000|20101229225554.000|TR0|(BEGIN VIDEOTAPE)
20101229225554.000|20101229225556.000|TR0|
20101229225556.000|20101229225559.000|TR0|KYUNG LAH, CNN INTERNATIONAL CORRESPONDENT 
20101229225559.000|20101229225601.000|TR0|(voice-over):  The war games are on in the 
20101229225601.000|20101229225604.000|TR0|Korean Peninsula.  Show of force after 
20101229225604.000|20101229225606.000|TR0|force from Seoul in military drills.  But 
20101229225606.000|20101229225608.000|TR0|there is another fierce battle here say 
20101229225608.000|20101229225611.000|TR0|netizens over cyberspace.
20101229225611.000|20101229225613.000|TR0|
20101229225613.000|20101229225616.000|TR0|"South Korea is competing with North Korea 
20101229225616.000|20101229225618.000|TR0|in trying to control the public," says Koh 
20101229225618.000|20101229225621.000|TR0|Jaeyoul, talking about South Korea's 
20101229225621.000|20101229225623.000|TR0|approach to social media users.  Koh, 
20101229225623.000|20101229225625.000|TR0|better known by his 72,000 Twitter 
20101229225625.000|20101229225628.000|TR0|followers as Dotzel (ph), is ranked as one 
20101229225628.000|20101229225630.000|TR0|of the world's top 20 twitterers by Twitos 
20101229225630.000|20101229225633.000|TR0|(ph).       (on camera):  Were they angry? 
20101229225633.000|20101229225635.000|TR0| Were people on cyberspace angry?
20101229225635.000|20101229225637.000|TR0|
20101229225637.000|20101229225640.000|TR0|(voice-over):  His followers have been 
20101229225640.000|20101229225642.000|TR0|very angry, he says, with recent 
20101229225642.000|20101229225645.000|TR0|government action against the social media 
20101229225645.000|20101229225647.000|TR0|users.
20101229225647.000|20101229225649.000|TR0|
20101229225649.000|20101229225652.000|TR0|Seoul is arguably the most wired city on 
20101229225652.000|20101229225654.000|TR0|the planet.  People often talk more over 
20101229225654.000|20101229225657.000|TR0|cyberspace than in person.  One message, 
20101229225657.000|20101229225659.000|TR0|whether true or false, spreads here faster 
20101229225659.000|20101229225701.000|TR0|than wildfire.
20101229225701.000|20101229225704.000|TR0|
20101229225704.000|20101229225706.000|TR0|After the sinking of a South Korean 
20101229225706.000|20101229225709.000|TR0|warship that killed 46 sailors, Internet 
20101229225709.000|20101229225711.000|TR0|chatter sparked conspiracy rumors that the 
20101229225711.000|20101229225714.000|TR0|South Koreans sunk its own warship and 
20101229225714.000|20101229225716.000|TR0|forced the South Korean government to 
20101229225716.000|20101229225718.000|TR0|shoot down the rumors.  After the 
20101229225718.000|20101229225721.000|TR0|Yeonpyong Island shelling last month, 
20101229225721.000|20101229225723.000|TR0|another rumor, that South Korea had 
20101229225723.000|20101229225726.000|TR0|declared war and the military was 
20101229225726.000|20101229225728.000|TR0|mobilizing.
20101229225728.000|20101229225730.000|TR0|
20101229225730.000|20101229225733.000|TR0|This time the government cracked down on 
20101229225733.000|20101229225735.000|TR0|the users and indicted 19 people for 
20101229225735.000|20101229225738.000|TR0|sending false text messages.
20101229225738.000|20101229225740.000|TR0|
20101229225740.000|20101229225742.000|TR0|(on camera):  But legal watchers say those 
20101229225742.000|20101229225745.000|TR0|19 people may soon be off the hook.  The 
20101229225745.000|20101229225747.000|TR0|telecommunications law that allowed the 
20101229225747.000|20101229225750.000|TR0|government to charge people for spreading 
20101229225750.000|20101229225752.000|TR0|lies on the Web with the intent to harm 
20101229225752.000|20101229225755.000|TR0|the public interest was declared 
20101229225755.000|20101229225757.000|TR0|unconstitutional, a decision being cheered 
20101229225757.000|20101229225759.000|TR0|by cyberspace, but gives the government 
20101229225759.000|20101229225802.000|TR0|fewer options to contain social media.
20101229225802.000|20101229225804.000|TR0|
20101229225804.000|20101229225807.000|TR0|(voice-over):  So South Korea's president 
20101229225807.000|20101229225809.000|TR0|has taken to the airwaves, urging his 
20101229225809.000|20101229225811.000|TR0|citizens to ignore rumors.  In his weekly 
20101229225811.000|20101229225814.000|TR0|radio address this week, he said there 
20101229225814.000|20101229225816.000|TR0|must be unity in public opinion for the 
20101229225816.000|20101229225819.000|TR0|sake of national security.
20101229225819.000|20101229225821.000|TR0|
20101229225821.000|20101229225823.000|TR0|And at a public park in downtown Seoul, 
20101229225823.000|20101229225826.000|TR0|this photo display put up by the 
20101229225826.000|20101229225828.000|TR0|government showing this year's attacks 
20101229225828.000|20101229225831.000|TR0|from Pyongyang which Seoul hopes would be 
20101229225831.000|20101229225833.000|TR0|more potent than Web chatter.
20101229225833.000|20101229225835.000|TR0|
20101229225835.000|20101229225838.000|TR0|Back with power twitterer Koh Jaeyoul, his 
20101229225838.000|20101229225840.000|TR0|followers continue to comment.  "The more 
20101229225840.000|20101229225843.000|TR0|you try to hide, distrust will grow," says 
20101229225843.000|20101229225845.000|TR0|one.
20101229225845.000|20101229225848.000|TR0|
20101229225848.000|20101229225850.000|TR0|Koh says instead of fighting social media, 
20101229225850.000|20101229225852.000|TR0|government should harness it.  "Whether 
20101229225852.000|20101229225855.000|TR0|public opinion is divided or undivided is 
20101229225855.000|20101229225857.000|TR0|not the issue," says Koh.  "What's 
20101229225857.000|20101229225900.000|TR0|important is whether issues are being 
20101229225900.000|20101229225902.000|TR0|fully discussed.  Government isn't always 
20101229225902.000|20101229225904.000|TR0|right.  There should be more 
20101229225904.000|20101229225907.000|TR0|communication."
20101229225907.000|20101229225909.000|TR0|
20101229225909.000|20101229225912.000|TR0|Balancing national security with free Web 
20101229225912.000|20101229225914.000|TR0|speech, the next step in the relationship 
20101229225914.000|20101229225916.000|TR0|between this republic and its people.
20101229225916.000|20101229225919.000|TR0|
20101229225919.000|20101229225921.000|TR0|Kyung Lah, CNN, Seoul.
